product_summary: Boost Interview is a cloud-based interviewing platform that helps businesses streamline their hiring process. It offers a range of features, including video interviewing, candidate management, and scheduling. Boost Interview is designed to make the interviewing process more efficient, effective, and fair.
product_pros: Helps businesses make better hiring decisions
Cloud-based so it can be used anywhere
product_cons: Lacks some features found in other interviewing platforms
Customer support is not always responsive
Can be difficult to integrate with other HR systems

product_usecases.details: Boost Interview can be used to screen candidates before inviting them to an in-person interview. This can help businesses save time and money by eliminating unqualified candidates.
Boost Interview allows businesses to conduct video interviews with candidates. This can be a great way to get to know candidates better and assess their communication skills.
Boost Interview can be used to manage the candidate pipeline. This includes tracking candidates' progress through the hiring process and communicating with them.
Boost Interview can be used to schedule interviews with candidates. This can be done through the platform's built-in scheduling tool.
Boost Interview can be used to help businesses make hiring decisions. The platform provides a range of tools and features to help businesses assess candidates' skills and experience.

product_toolfor.details: Boost Interview can help recruiters find and screen qualified candidates more efficiently.
Boost Interview can help hiring managers make better hiring decisions by providing them with a range of tools and features to assess candidates' skills and experience.
Boost Interview is an affordable solution for small businesses that need to streamline their hiring process.
Boost Interview can be used by enterprises to manage their global hiring process.
Boost Interview is a cloud-based platform that can be used by remote teams to conduct video interviews and manage the candidate pipeline.

product_pricing: Boost Interview offers a range of pricing plans to suit businesses of all sizes. Plans start at $99 per month.
